resources.string: We are sorry, but we need ads to pay for our Servers that host the music files

Privacy Policy 

YuSIc collects user analytics, more specifically the 'Android advertising identifier', and it's linked information. 
Primarily, this helps us to run targeted ads in the best ways possible.


If you wish to use the music application 'YuSIc', you are consenting to us collecting information about how you interact with the applications advertisements.
